hint: A high-level, interpreted programming language used for web development, data analysis, and artificial intelligence.
A popular object-oriented language used for developing desktop and mobile applications, as well as web applications and enterprise software.
A scripting language primarily used for creating interactive web pages and web applications.
A high-performance, compiled language used for system programming, game development, and other performance-critical applications.
A dynamic, object-oriented language known for its simplicity and productivity, often used for web development and scripting.
A relatively new language developed by Apple, primarily used for developing iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS applications.
A language developed by Google, designed for concurrency and efficient system-level programming.
A server-side scripting language used for web development and server-side programming.
A systems programming language designed for speed, safety, and concurrency.
A language used for managing relational databases, querying and manipulating data, and managing database structures.
